.  The main feature of the town, was always the Hydro-Majestic hotel.  An grand old hotel, for accommodation and high tea overlooking the spectacular valley.  The hotel has been closed for several years, and there have been several failed attempts at renovation.  While the hotel is closed, there is not much to see or do in the small mountain village.

value: content=This grand hotel began its life in 1904 as a health resort, and it is probably the main attraction of Medlow Bath.  The view from the dining room over the Megalong was simply stunning, with large glass windows.  The hotel has been closed for several years.  It is not clear when it will reopen.
